Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44964 affecting package memcached for versions less than 1.6.22-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-44964 affecting package memcached for versions less than 1.6.22-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package memcached is earlier than 1.6.22-2, affected by CVE-2021-44964
